title: Notice of dissenters' rights
context: B. Procedure for Exercise of Dissenters&rsquo; Rights [ยง414-351] Notice of dissenters&rsquo; rights. (a) If proposed corporate action creating dissenters&rsquo; rights under section 414-342 is submitted to a vote at a shareholders&rsquo; meeting, the meeting notice must state that shareholders are or may be entitled to assert dissenters&rsquo; rights under this part and be accompanied by a copy of this part. (b) If corporate action creating dissenters&rsquo; rights under section 414-342 is taken without a vote of shareholders, the corporation shall notify in writing all shareholders entitled to assert dissenters&rsquo; rights that the action was taken and send them the dissenters&rsquo; notice described in section 414-353.
